page.title: 11A FAMILY DAY IN LEASINGHAM.
page.content: On Sundays we get up at{9.00am. When{breakfast}is finished and the table has been cleared and the dishes have been washed the{dog}is taken for a walk at about{9.30,}for about{45 minutes. Then the family plays{tennis}at the tennis courts for an hour and a half. Then the{barbecue}needs getting ready at 12.30pm.We eat the barbecue at 1.00. Then we go for{a drive}down the country roads.At 1.30 we go back and help wash the dishes.Then we all take the dog for a{walk}down the park. We arrive back at 2.30.Then we put the dog to bed. At 3.00 we go to the park.At 6.00 we have a big tea,then we have a bath. When we are ready for bed we have supper.After we have had supper we go to bed.
